sql-select.name: GetTDECertificateNotBackedUpRecently
TDE Certificate Not Backed Up Recently
sql-select.description: The certificate is used to encrypt database, but there certificate was not backuped up recently or backup is not up to date.
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSD.[name] AS [DatabaseName] ,tSC.[name] AS [CertificateName] ,tSC.[pvt_key_last_backup_date] AS [LatestCertificateBackupDate] ,CASE WHEN (tSC.[pvt_key_last_backup_date] IS NULL) THEN 1 WHEN (tSC.[pvt_key_last_backup_date] <= DATEADD(dd, -1 * ISNULL(@intDaysTDEBackupThreshold, 30), GETDATE())) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS [CertificateBackupStatus] FROM [sys].[certificates] tSC INNER JOIN [sys].[dm_database_encryption_keys] tDEK ON tDEK.[encryptor_thumbprint] = tSC.[thumbprint] LEFT OUTER JOIN [sys].[databases] tSD ON tSD.[database_id] = tDEK.[database_id] ORDER BY tSD.[name];
